description: Newly renovated and spacious 1-bedroom apartment in the basement of a 1920s rowhouse, with both private entrance and access to backyard. It has a comfortable bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with gas stove and full-sized fridge, and a laundry room with washer and gas dryer. Located in a family-oriented but vibrant Brooklyn neighborhood, with plenty of stores and too many restaurants and bars to count. 3 blocks from a subway stop and 5 blocks from an express bus stop (20 min to Manhattan).
name: Newly renovated and cozy 1-bedroom in Brooklyn
review:
Mario's place is clean,beautiful and welly . The place can easily access to the Subway station . 

Mario and his family is very friendly and kind .  I most definitely recommend anyone who is interested !
